Articles.Content:
its thanksgiving and Dr. Turkey is building a turkey to go to the moon on KSPTV. that got me thinking of a challenge

[B][SIZE=4][FONT=Arial Black]MAKE A TURKEY SHIP THAT CAN DO ANYTHING[/FONT][FONT=Arial Black]![/FONT][/SIZE] [/B]
Dr. turkey said that stock part could suffice on the stream and as such its going to be stock only
your ship can either be a spaceship, submarine, plane, boat, satellite(probe) it does not matter just have fun with your crafts :D

the only mod allowed is tweak scale but its Optional [COLOR="#FFA500"](**optional has this **)[/COLOR]
[COLOR="#FF0000"](* this means its required for you do do...*)[/COLOR]

here are some Rules:

1. 1st and for most I will allow TWEAKSCALE to make it look like more of a turkey but otherwise Keep it stock.[COLOR="#FF0000"]*[/COLOR]

2. have either a pictures of it or videos doesn't mater as long as you built it and have proof

3. no cheating now this involves ctrl alt f12 infinite fuel etc...

4. Have fun.

[COLOR="#FFA500"]**[/COLOR]5. (optional) if you want you can upload your turkey-craft to the challenge after all it is thanksgiving after all :)

I will post the craft files up here as there being posted with the owners permission and consent

1.
2.
3.
4.
5.
6.

11.

this is also my last challenge before the big move anyway enjoy while it lasts :D
Lego8_bit Edited November 27, 2015 by Lego8_bit
